refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: idt -- This is the period, in seconds, that the average amplitude of asig is reported. If the frequency of asig is low then idt must be large (more than half the period of asig )

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: asig -- This is the signal from which to extract the envelope.
